snippet: A charismatic pastor with a bad-boy reputation, Mark Driscoll stepped down after an inquiry by the church he founded, Mars Hill, criticized his “arrogance,” “quick temper” and “domineering manner.”
abstract: Mark Driscoll, charismatic pastor of sprawling Mars Hill evangelical church in Seattle resigns after completion of internal investigation into his managerial conduct; Driscoll's rise and fall are among the more dramatic in recent annals of American evangelicalism.
lead_paragraph: A charismatic pastor with a bad-boy reputation, Mark Driscoll stepped down after an inquiry by the church he founded, Mars Hill, criticized his “arrogance,” “quick temper” and “domineering manner.”

headline.main: Divisive Pastor Quits Post at Seattle Church
headline.print_headline: Divisive Pastor Quits Post at Seattle Church
